subject: URGENT: Verify your account
body: Dear customer, we noticed suspicious activity. Click http://yourbank.verify-account.com to verify immediately.
clues: Sender domain is not the official bank domain
Link uses a subdomain that looks suspicious
Urgent language pressuring you to click

subject: New sign-in to your GitHub account
body: We detected a new sign-in from London. If this was you, ignore. If not, secure your account here: https://github.com/settings/security

subject: Your account will be locked
body: Click https://paypalsecure-login.com/verify to prevent account suspension.
clues: Domain is not PayPal's official domain

subject: Top stories today
body: Here are today's top news stories. Read more on https://www.bbc.co.uk/news
clues: Informative content with no urgent links

subject: Your Apple ID has been compromised
body: Verify your account here: http://appleid.verify-account.com immediately.
clues: Link domain does not match official Apple domain
Sender looks slightly different from real Apple email

subject: You have new connection requests
body: View your new connection requests at https://www.linkedin.com/mynetwork/
clues: No suspicious links or urgent language

subject: Your account has been suspended
body: Click https://netflix-login.com/verify to reactivate your account.

subject: New login detected
body: We detected a new login. If it wasnâ€™t you, secure your account: https://twitter.com/settings/security

subject: Verify your online banking
body: Click https://chasebank-verify.com/login to avoid account closure.

subject: Your order has shipped
body: Your order #12345 has shipped. Track it here: https://www.amazon.com/trackorder
